weather.advice: Humidity is moderate (53%) with a gentle breeze. Weather is comfortable, suitable for outdoor activities.

hero_news.title: Alphabet Seeks $16B for Waymo at $110B Valuation
hero_news.summary: Alphabet is reportedly pursuing a massive $16 billion funding round for its self-driving unit Waymo, aiming for a valuation of $110 billion. This move underscores continued confidence in autonomous driving AI despite market fluctuations.
